name: Zova AI Chatbot
platform_story: Zova is your free, open-source gateway to intelligent customer engagement. Powered by Google's Gemini AI, it bridges the gap between complex AI technology and everyday website needs. We built Zova to empower developers and business owners to offer instant, 24/7 support without breaking the bank or requiring a PhD in machine learning.
description: A free, open-source, and fully customizable AI chatbot powered by Gemini. Integrate it into any website in minutes.
purpose: Zova helps website owners provide instant, intelligent customer support through AI-powered conversations. Perfect for e-commerce, SaaS, portfolio sites, and more.

pricing.details: Zova itself is 100% free. You only pay for the underlying infrastructure if you exceed their free tiers.

breakdown.note: Generous free tier for Gemini Flash models. Paid tiers available for high volume.
100,000 requests/day for free. Sufficient for most small-medium sites.

key_features.description: Leverages the speed and intelligence of Gemini 2.5 Flash Lite for instant, accurate responses.

integration_steps.title: Download & Drop
integration_steps.description: Download the chatbot folder from GitHub and place it in your website's root directory.

integration_steps.title: Add the Script
integration_steps.description: Include the chatbot script before the closing </body> tag.

integration_steps.title: Configure Your Bot
integration_steps.description: Edit chatbot/config.json to customize your bot's name, colors, and behavior.
integration_steps.details: Set your Cloudflare Worker URL, customize colors, add your business data, and you're live!

troubleshooting.solution: Check if the script path in your HTML is correct and ensures the 'chatbot' folder is in the root.
Verify your Cloudflare Worker is deployed and the URL in config.json is correct. Ensure your Gemini API key is valid in the Worker.
Ensure your site is served over HTTPS (required for microphone access) or localhost.

limitations: Requires an internet connection to function (calls Gemini API).
Cannot execute code or database operations directly on your server (for security).
History is stored locally in the user's browser (no central database).

FAQs.question: Is Zova really free?
FAQs.answer: Yes! Zova is 100% free and open-source. You only pay for Gemini API usage (which has a generous free tier) and Cloudflare Workers (also has a free tier).

FAQs.question: Do I need coding knowledge to use Zova?
FAQs.answer: Basic knowledge helps, but integration is simple. Just copy files, add one script tag, and edit a JSON config file. Our setup guide walks you through everything.

FAQs.question: Can I customize the chatbot appearance?
FAQs.answer: Absolutely! You can customize colors, bot name, icon, initial message, and behavior all through the config.json file.

FAQs.question: How do I add my business data to the chatbot?
FAQs.answer: Edit the data/shop-data.json file with your products, services, FAQs, and business information. The chatbot will automatically use this context to answer questions.

FAQs.question: Is my API key secure?
FAQs.answer: Yes! By using Cloudflare Workers as a proxy, your Gemini API key is never exposed to the browser. It stays secure on Cloudflare's edge network.

FAQs.question: Can I use Zova for non-e-commerce websites?
FAQs.answer: Definitely! While Zova is great for e-commerce, you can customize the data file for any use case: portfolios, SaaS products, blogs, documentation sites, and more.

FAQs.question: What's the API usage cost?
FAQs.answer: Gemini 2.5 Flash Lite is very affordable with a generous free tier. Most small to medium websites stay within the free quota. Check Google AI pricing for details.

FAQs.question: Can I deploy Zova on any hosting platform?
FAQs.answer: Yes! Zova is just HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It works on any hosting platform: GitHub Pages, Netlify, Vercel, traditional web hosts, or even locally.

FAQs.question: What happens if I exceed the free limits?
FAQs.answer: If you exceed the Gemini or Cloudflare free tiers, you may need to upgrade to a paid plan on their respective platforms. Zova itself remains free.

FAQs.question: Does Zova store chat history?
FAQs.answer: Zova stores chat history locally in the user's browser (localStorage) for convenience. It does not store conversations on a central server.
